name: [1/1CL] Public Operations Group
description: P.O.G is a generalist public regiment open to all respectful players. We organize and host operations and frequently collaborate with other groups. We cover all in-game roles and have a place for everyone. P.O.G is a great introduction to the game.

name: [2/1CL] The Colonial Shadows
description: TCS is a Reconnaissance and Partisan-focused regiment, specializing in Spec-Ops and deep backline operations.

name: [3/1CL] War Machine
description: WM specializes building and driving tanks and other vehicles. We also have an unhealthy addiction to facilities.
